moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.effect: The more damage dealt to the target, the more this move restores the user’s HP.

moves.name: Potion
moves.effect: Restores an ally’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Let’s Brainstorm!
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Atk and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of lowering the target’s Attack by 1 stat rank.

passives.name: Escape Artist
passives.description: Prevents the user from becoming trapped.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Flameproof
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting burned.
